web developer + designer

I have 4+ years experience in design and 3+ years in web development

Bonjour, as we say here

My name is Harold AO. I'm a 17 year-old French front-end developer and ui/graphic designer based in france (but worldwilde working). I'm available for projects, collaborations and experiments.

Always Be Creative

This is my philosophy. I started Graphic Design while I was doing Youtube Videos few years ago. Since that, I started working with youtubers. Now I do Graphic Design + UI Design and I bring my work to life through front-end development.
